name: hvb
description: Encryption/decryption module with original data type preserved

directories.prep-tests:
rm -fr reports/; mkdir reports/; mkdir reports/eslint/; mkdir reports/junit/; echo "Reports
---" > reports/README.md; echo "Unit tests results
---" > reports/junit/README.md;  echo "eslint results
---" > reports/eslint/README.md
directories._eslint: npm run aliases; OUT='./reports/eslint/eslint.txt'; date > $OUT; eslint src/*.js >> $OUT; eslint ./index.js >> $OUT; eslint tests/specs/*.js >> $OUT; echo "DONE!"
directories._junit: npm run prep-tests; npm run aliases; jasmine-node --junitreport --growl tests/specs/; mv reports/*.xml reports/junit/; git checkout tests/props/*.*
directories._coverage: rm -fr reports/coverage/; npm run aliases; istanbul cover --include-all-sources -x "**src/tool/**" jasmine-node tests/specs/; rm -fr reports/coverage/; mv coverage reports/; git checkout tests/props/*.*
directories.test: npm run prep-tests; npm run aliases; echo""; echo "Running all tests..."; echo ""; jasmine-node --growl tests/specs/

scripts.test: echo "Place holder - no tests yet" && exit 1

author: Martin Swiderski
